title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 369/85 of 13 February 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2729/81 as regards the transferability of rights arising from an export licence in the milk and milk products sector and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 664/83
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 369/85
of 13 February 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2729/81 as regards the transferability of rights arising from an export licence in the milk and milk products sector and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 664/83
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Article 10 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2729/81 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 February 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 150, 6. 6. 1984, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 272, 26. 9. 1981, p. 19.
(4) OJ No L 186, 13. 7. 1984, p. 17.
(5) OJ No L 338, 13. 12. 1980, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 78, 24. 3. 1983, p. 13.
(7) OJ No L 21, 26. 1. 1984, p. 14.
